mentions.context: They used in particular ProvSQL [62], a tool integrated into PostgreSQL that can perform lineage computation in various semirings, and the knowledge compiler c2d [21].
They used in particular ProvSQL [62], a tool integrated into PostgreSQL that can perform lineage computation in various semirings, and the knowledge compiler c2d [21].
In this context, we believe that it is important to facilitate the use of existing algorithms by incorporating them into Postgres extensions such as ProvSQL [62].
